typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		Year as integer,
		Product_Type as string,
		Sales as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourcecsv
sourcecsv filter(Year == 2017) ~> FilterSalesYear
FilterSalesYear sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
